directions.step:
12 grain flour may be purchased mail order from a below listed source. Also, 7/9 grain cereal may be ground into flour - Flour Equivalent 3 cups
Here are some mail order sources: Arrowhead Mills - 806-346-0730 Garden Spot Distrib. 800-829-5100 Great Valley Mills - 215-256-6648 Jaffee Bros. Inc - 619-749-1282 King Arthur Flour - 802-649-3881 Walnut Acres - 800-433-3998
Posted by "Rob Ryerson" <RYERSONRA@compctr.ccs.csus.edu>.
